knimeNode.name: GA Management Insert Filter (P&G)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Insert a filter into a Google Analytics property.

fullDescription.intro: This node is designed to insert a filter into a view. Based on what type of filter you choose there will be different boxes to fill out. Filter Name is always required as well as most text fields on all types of filters.

ports.outPort: Filters that have been added to the GA Account Property
